name: .HVPL File Extension
summary: Learn about .HVPL files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Plug-in created for iTunes, an audio and video player for Mac and Windows; contains a package that extends the functionality of the application; used for add-ons such as audio visualizers and music selection players that make intelligent decisions.

content: NOTE: iTunes plug-ins are typically distributed as .DMG or .MSI files that are installed on your system.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
